Q_DESC:
Write a C program that, given an array A[] of n numbers and another number x, determines whether or not there exist two elements in S whose sum is exactly x.

INPUT
First line contains the size of array A.
Second line contains elements of the array
The third line contains value of the sum S

OUTPUT
The output prints required Pair
TESTCASE_2:
5
1 2 3 4 5
5
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Pair with given sum 5 is (3,2)
Pair with given sum 5 is (1,4)
